e7693080099f4ac19e646b45b7fdfb36.desc:
The way we communicate with customers can greatly influence the way people judge government services and helps us ensure we get the right information at the right time.

The purpose of this unit is to help you develop your professional communication skills.

The material in this package contains four main sections:

What is professional communication

  • Communicating professionally in writing
  • Communicating professionally by telephone
  • Communicating professionally face to face
e7693080099f4ac19e646b45b7fdfb36.priceAdditional:
You can book this course as a group booking for up to 24 people and run it on your own premises at a total cost of £5,130, which could be as little as £213 each.

A group booking for up to 24 people at an external venue will cost £4,432 or as little as £184 each.

VAT is not included.
